channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House GOP resolution would overturn Biden's gas water heater ban
item.description: Rep. Gary Palmer of Alabama introduced a resolution to overturn President Biden's recent ban on natural gas-fired water heaters by 2029.

item.title: Minnesota House Democrats Take Opening Day Off, Will Get Paid For Doing Nothing
item.description: It is like one team skipping the Super Bowl because their quarterback is injured. If your team is not ready by game day, it’s tough luck.

item.title: Porsche crisis renews calls for part-time CEO Oliver Blume to relinquish dual role at Volkswagen
item.description: Soaring costs, declining vehicle sales and problems in China are raising pressure on Oliver Blume to cede one of his two CEO jobs.
